issue.title: Some COLLADA textures are invisible since pull request #2536

content.raw:
We had some problems with transparent mesh in latest Gazebo 8 builds also with the iCub model (https://github.com/robotology/icub-gazebo).
All the meshes in https://github.com/robotology/icub-gazebo/tree/master/icub/meshes/visual except for `icub_head.dae`, `icub_eye.dae` and `icub_head_without_eyes.dae` are rendered as transparent, I highly suspect this is due to this bug. 

cc @francesco_romano
content.html:
